com.instamojo.mojosdk.activities

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
                • com.instamojo.mojosdk.activities.BaseActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormActivity, PaymentActivity 

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Base Activity to all the Activities in the SDK. Implements Calligraphy using reflection. The default font will be applied through context wrappers as defined in the Calligraphy Documentation. Any newly created activity must extend this BaseActivity for the proper application of the default font.
    Since:
    14/03/16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    vedhavyas

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseActivity

        public BaseActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • returnResult

        public void returnResult(android.os.Bundle bundle,
                int result)
        returnResult is used to pass back the appropriate result to the initiator activity that started this activity for result. The method will call Activity.finish() and the current activity will be stopped.
        Parameters:
        bundle - if any extra params that need to be passed back.
        result - Appropriate Activity result to be sent back to caller Activity - Activity.RESULT_OK on Success or Activity.RESULT_CANCELED on Failure.

      • returnResult

        public void returnResult(int result)
        Overloading method for returnResult(Bundle, int) with null Bundle.
        Parameters:
        result - Appropriate Activity result to be sent back to caller Activity - Activity.RESULT_OK on Success or Activity.RESULT_CANCELED on Failure.

      • hideKeyboard

        public void hideKeyboard()
        Hides the Soft keyboard if activated.
